lead_paragraph: British cyclist Lizzie Armitstead won an appeal against an anti-doping violation, clearing the world road race champion to compete at the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Cyclist Armitstead Wins Appeal Against Doping Violations
headline.main: Cyclist Armitstead Wins Appeal Against Doping Violations

snippet: British cyclist Lizzie Armitstead won an appeal against an anti-doping violation, clearing the world road race champion to compete at the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro....
